title: Customer Service Dispatch VA
job_overview:
We are seeking a proactive, highly organized Customer Service & Dispatch Virtual Assistant to support our garage door service operations in managing day-to-day customer communications, technician coordination, and service scheduling. The ideal candidate is dependable, detail-oriented, and experienced in working independently in a virtual setting while maintaining high levels of efficiency and customer satisfaction.

Key Responsibilities:
- Answer and manage incoming customer service calls for garage door repairs
- Collect comprehensive customer information and service requirements
- Schedule service appointments and coordinate timing with customers
- Manage and coordinate WhatsApp communications with field technicians
- Receive and process work orders from advertising partners
- Assign service jobs to technicians based on location, availability, and expertise
- Input and maintain customer data in GoHighLevel CRM system
- Track technician schedules and optimize service routing
- Monitor service delivery timelines and send follow-up communications
- Handle customer inquiries and service coordination with professionalism
- Support field operations, logistics, and appointment management

Requirements:
- Excellent English communication skills (written and verbal)
- Experience in customer service, phone support, and dispatch operations
- Prior role as a Customer Service or Dispatch Virtual Assistant
- Strong attention to detail, time management, and coordination abilities
- High level of professionalism and customer service orientation
- Comfortable collaborating with field service teams and management

Preferred Skills:
- Proficiency in GoHighLevel CRM, WhatsApp Business, and service management tools
- Strong interpersonal skills and relationship-building mindset
- Experience in service industry operations or field service coordination

Why Join Us?
Be part of a growing garage door service company with a commitment to excellence
Gain direct experience in service operations and customer relationship management
Work remotely with flexibility, autonomy, and the chance to make a real impact
If you're resourceful, efficient, and ready to support a fast-moving service operation, apply now and help drive our customer service excellence.
